Detailed Description

Local coordinates system class.

This class implements a local coordinates system defined by three perpendicular vectors (the base axis). The class members are the unitary vectors X, Y and Z that define the system, the rotation matrix that maps the system to world coordinates and the transpose of this matrix (stored for efficiency. The methods available include updating the rotation matrices, rotating the system and aligning the Z vector with a given direction.
